import React from "react"; import { Col, Row, Card, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { CardDetailsForm } from "components/Forms"; import { OrderHistoryWidget, ChangePlanWidget } from "components/Widgets"; export default () => { const RequiredLabel = ({ label }) => ( {label} * ); return ( <>
Billing details
 Country Adress City Zip/Postal code VAT ID Phone Number ); };
